
{{{class="brush:c++"
void add_label(GtkWidget *widget, gpointer label)
{
    num++ ;
    sprintf(buf,"%d", num) ;
    gtk_label_set_text(GTK_LABEL(label),buf) ;
}

void sub_label(GtkWidget *widget, gpointer label)
{
    num-- ;
    sprintf(buf, "%d", num) ;
    gtk_label_set_text(GTK_LABEL(label),buf) ;
}



g_signal_connect(G_OBJECT(add), "clicked", G_CALLBACK(add_label), (gpointer)label) ;
g_signal_connect(G_OBJECT(sub), "clicked", G_CALLBACK(sub_label), (gpointer)label) ;
}}}


{{{class="brush:c++"
void get_entry_to_label(GtkWidget *Widget,gpointer data)
{
    const gchar *text;

    text = (gchar *)malloc(sizeof(gchar));
    text = gtk_entry_get_text(GTK_ENTRY(entry));//获取entry的内容

    gtk_label_set_text(GTK_LABEL(label),text);//设置label的内容
}
void reset_entry(GtkWidget *Widget,gpointer data)
{
gtk_entry_set_text(GTK_ENTRY(entry),"欢迎光临www.bailangcn.tk");//设置entry的内容
}
    

g_signal_connect(G_OBJECT(button),"pressed",G_CALLBACK(get_entry_to_label),NULL);
g_signal_connect(G_OBJECT(reset),"pressed",G_CALLBACK(reset_entry),NULL);
}}}
